name: about:addons - Remove Addon Compatibility Warning
description: Removes the useless annoying "Add-on compatibility checking is disabled. You may have incompatible addons" message at the header of about:addons menu after installing Addon Compatibility Reporter.
additional_info:
Changelog
------------->
v1.0.1 ( 28/09/2011 )
- Added more selector so that the compatibility report button is not removed

v1.0 ( 24/09/2011 )
- Released
